text: Veljko Mandić (10 October 1924 – 19 November 1988) was a Montenegrin actor. He appeared in more than fifty films from 1955 to 1988. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title ! title: Veljko Mandić
